channel.title: Re: Pathfinding algorithm [JAVA]
channel.description:
I've recently been working on something similar. You'll actually want to use A* algorithm over Dijkstra's as its more efficient. I've got source code and an applet showing it working at the link below. I am looking to increase my codes efficiency though if anyone has suggestions.
[url=http://camhartech.blogspot.com/]http://camhartech.blogspot.com/[/url]
These images should show the difference between a* and dijkstra's. Dijkstra's [img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/23/Dijkstras_progress_animation.gif[/img]
A* [img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/5/5d/Astar_progress_animation.gif[/img]
Hope that helps!
